headline: Is Oracle Still Attractively Priced After Its Big AI and Cloud Driven Rally?
summary: Wondering if Oracle is still worth buying after its massive run, or if the smart move now is to wait for a better entry price? This article unpacks whether the current share price really lines up with the company’s long term potential. Oracle has cooled off recently, with the stock down roughly 1.9% over the last week and 22.0% over the past month, even though it is still up 21.1% year to date and 7.9% over the past year, and a huge 164.9% over three years and 261.0% over five years. Those...
